Actions.Name: Blast
Actions.AreaEffect: Deal 1 piercing damage again to all characters for each character caught in the area, up to a maximum of three times.

CustomComponents.Name: Round 3+
CustomComponents.Description: Increase blast to a large blast and deals bonus damage.

Actions.Name: Emberflash
Actions.AreaEffect: 2 piercing damage and create a dangerous terrain space in the center, which can be placed under a character.

Actions.Name: Flash Fire
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 becomes vulnerable. Vulnerable foes are shoved 2 and take 1 piercing damage twice.
